pullrequest.title: Fixing typos and improving style in the online documentation

content.raw: The original link returns an error page (at least this seems to be the case when you do not have push access to the OSRF repo). Since this documentation is largely targeted at the general public, I felt it would be better to link to a page that explains how to create a pull request on Bitbucket.
content.html: The original link returns an error page (at least this seems to be the case when you do not have push access to the OSRF repo). Since this documentation is largely targeted at the general public, I felt it would be better to link to a page that explains how to create a pull request on Bitbucket.
